text: The easiest place to draw inspiration for a Halloween costumes this year is right in front of you â€” your TV and computer screens. Take a cue from pop culture and dress up like your favorite characters from movies and shows. We have rounded up just about every person possible that you can morph yourself into for All Hallows'Eve. All it takes is some clothes from your own closet and a few additional items. Check out these 117 awesome ideas and make your friends jealous for being so brilliant this year.
